pr_title: Upgrade to the ORCID v3 API

timeline.bodyText: I'd like to see a second Integration Test that runs against a sample (static) response from ORCID (which we can enable to run always in Travis CI).  Otherwise, we only have this disabled end-to-end test, which wouldn't allow us to continually validate that our code works with the ORCID API.
timeline.author: tdonohue

replies.bodyText:
It looks like previous feedback was resolved by adding some static XML test output and adding a few *MockitoTest() methods to this same class.
@abollini : Could you update the JavaDocs at the top of this class to note that it does static testing by default (using the *MockitoTest() methods below), but will do full end-to-end testing (of the real API) when you set orcid.clientid
replies.author: tdonohue
